description: Use to get the encryption configuration for an account.

nested_items.name: encryptionConfig
nested_items.description: An EncryptionConfig object that contains the KMS key ARN that is used for encryption. By default, CodeGuru Security uses an AWS-managed key for encryption. To specify your own key, call UpdateAccountConfiguration. If you do not specify a customer-managed key, returns empty.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN that is used for encryption. If an AWS-managed key is used for encryption, returns empty.
